text: posting what I think about their ad, does not mean I’m triggered. I’m just pointing out how ridiculous the social justice in their ad is. How about pointing out the high suicide rate in men or high rate of men been incarcerated. What they have shown in the ad is men been the problem. However there are women bullying other women and/or sexually harassing others, so why portrait men as the only ones causing the problem? By portraying most men as the aggressors or as a bystander.

@vote4sotelo how is how you treat people a liberal or conservative issue? I noticed you’re a fellow veteran, didn’t your drills teach you about honour and respect not only for your fellow servicemen and women but for people in general? If this advert isn’t reflective of you, your behaviour, or how you treat people, there’s no reason to get triggered.
@spot.the.mark LOL, I just do not want more left ideology in my everyday life or people like you telling me that your liberal views are better than my conservative views.
I guess you’re it’s target audience, because it got you triggered
